revision.text:
When players reach a new region, the pre-evolutions ('''Baby Pokémon''') of certain Pokémon can be obtained by breeding them in the [[Pokemon Day Care]]. =Chart of Baby Pokémon= In the table below, the adult Pokémon must be bred to obtain the respective Baby Pokémon. '''Bolded''' names indicate that breeding is the only way to get the Pokémon in their respective regions. Adult Pokémon names with an * can only be obtained in later [[Regions]]. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- ! Baby !! Adult !! Unlock Location |- | '''{{Pokemon|Pichu}}''' || {{Pokemon|Pikachu}}
{{Pokemon|Raichu}} || rowspan = 8 | [[Johto]] |- | '''{{Pokemon|Cleffa}}''' || {{Pokemon|Clefairy}}
{{Pokemon|Clefable}} |- | '''{{Pokemon|Igglybuff}}''' || {{Pokemon|Jigglypuff}}
{{Pokemon|Wigglytuff}} |- | {{Pokemon|Togepi}} || {{Pokemon|Togetic}}
{{Pokemon|Togekiss}}* |- | {{Pokemon|Tyrogue}} || {{Pokemon|Hitmonlee}}
{{Pokemon|Hitmonchan}}
{{Pokemon|Hitmontop}} |- | '''{{Pokemon|Smoochum}}''' || {{Pokemon|Jynx}} |- | {{Pokemon|Elekid}} || {{Pokemon|Electabuzz}}
{{Pokemon|Electivire}}* |- | {{Pokemon|Magby}} || {{Pokemon|Magmar}}
{{Pokemon|Magmortar}}* |- | '''{{Pokemon|Azurill}}''' || {{Pokemon|Marill}}
{{Pokemon|Azumarill}} || rowspan = 2 | [[Hoenn]] |- | {{Pokemon|Wynaut}} || {{Pokemon|Wobbuffet}} |- | {{Pokemon|Budew}} || {{Pokemon|Roselia}}
{{Pokemon|Roserade}} || rowspan = 10 | [[Sinnoh]] |- | {{Pokemon|Chingling}} || {{Pokemon|Chimecho}} |- | '''{{Pokemon|Bonsly}}''' || {{Pokemon|Sudowoodo}} |- | '''{{Pokemon|Mime Jr.}}''' || {{Pokemon|Mr. Mime}}
{{Pokemon|Galarian Mr. Mime}}*
{{Pokemon|Mr. Rime}}* |- | '''{{Pokemon|Happiny}}''' || {{Pokemon|Chansey}}

{{Pokemon|Blessing Blissey}} |- | {{Pokemon|Munchlax}} || {{Pokemon|Snorlax}} |- | {{Pokemon|Riolu}} || {{Pokemon|Lucario}}
{{Pokemon|Mega Lucario}}* |- | {{Pokemon|Mantyke}} || {{Pokemon|Mantine}} |- | '''{{Pokemon|Phione}}''' || {{Pokemon|Manaphy}} |- | '''{{Pokemon|Larvesta}}''' || {{Pokemon|Volcarona}} || [[Unova]] |- | {{Pokemon|Toxel}} || {{Pokemon|Toxtricity (Amped)}}
